Posts.EditableText: I'm having a bit of trouble setting up stats for combat. I've been using testcombat.aslx as a guide. I've added the combat lib. I've added all cmb_addStatus call functions and the last - cmb_startTurnscript. Very happy with how the combay works, but I don't get any stats in the window. Any idea?
